article_title: If Pfizer's Right, Hospira Biosimilar Gold Rush Begins

article_metadata.author: Bruce Japsen

og.description: Hospira (HSP), the injectable generic drug maker Pfizer (PFE) is buying for $90 a share, is making its biggest foray yet into the business of cheaper “generic” biologic drugs this week, launching the biosimilar to the pricey autoimmune drug Remicade in Europe. Hospira will begin selling Inflectra, also known as infliximab, [...]
